definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: talk wildly (MT [[לָָעוּ]] [[יָ֫לַע]] perh. better wd. Be [[לָעוּ֫]], [[יִ֫לַע]] (√ [[לעה]]), cf. Thes and Ar. laga0, lagiya make mistakes in talking, Ba:ZMG xii. 1887, 605, 614);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 mpl. [[לָָעוּ]] Job 6:3, subj. [[דברים]] (v. Di); Impf. [[מוֹקֵשׁ אָדָם יָ֫לַע קׂדֶשׁ]] Pr 20:25 it is a snare to a man that he should rashly cry, Holy ! (construction unusual, and perh. text, err., cf. Frankenberg; on form v. Ol:§ 243 a Anm; Bö:i. 296 Kö:i. 375 f. der. fr. [[לעע]]; Str., Hiph. fr. [[לעע]]).
